## Gene Details:

- **Gene Name:** serine acetyltransferase 2;2, SERINE ACETYLTRANSFERASE-1, SERINE ACETYLTRANSFERASE A, SERINE ACETYLTRANSFERASE-MITOCHONDRIAL, SERINE ACETYLTRANSFERASE 3, serine acetyltransferase 2;2
